Package com.example.qr

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OnAddCommentListener
    This interface represents a listener for adding a comment operation.
    OnCheckQRCodeExistListener
    A callback interface for when a check for the existence of a QR code has been performed.
    OnGetAllPlayerListener
    This interface represents a listener for getting all players operation.
    OnGetAllQRCodeListener
    A callback interface for when all QR codes have been retrieved.
    OnGetCommentByHashListener
    A callback interface for when the comments for a given hash have been retrieved.
    OnGetCommentNumListener
    A callback interface for when the number of comments for a given resource has been retrieved.
    OnGetGeoListener
    This interface represents a listener for getting geolocation operation.
    OnGetHashByUsernameListener
    A callback interface for when the hashcodes for a given username have been retrieved.
    OnGetPlayerListener
    A callback interface for when a single player has been retrieved.
    OnGetPlayerQRCodesListener
    This interface represents a listener for getting player QR codes operation.
    OnGetQRCodeGeolocations
    A callback interface for when geolocations for a QR code have been retrieved.
    OnGetQRCodeListener
    A callback interface for when a single QR code has been retrieved.
    OnGetQRCodeNamesListener
    A callback interface for when a list of QR code names has been retrieved.
    OnGetQRCodeScoreListener
    This interface represents a listener for getting QR code score operation.
    OnGetQRCommentListener
    This interface represents a listener for getting QR code comments operation.
    OnGetQRRepListener
    This interface represents a listener for getting QR code replies operation.
    OnGetQRScoreListener
    This interface represents a listener for getting QR code scores operation.
    OnQRCodeLengthComplete
    A callback interface for when a QR code's length has been determined.
    ScoreArrayConstructingListener
    The ScoreArrayConstructingListener interface provides a method for handling the successful construction of an array of scores.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddCodeActivity
    The AddCodeActivity class is responsible for scanning QR codes and displaying the results .
    BuildConfig  
    CaptureAct
    The CaptureAct class extends the CaptureActivity class and is responsible for capturing images of QR codes.
    ContactActivity
    The ContactActivity class extends the AppCompatActivity class and is responsible for displaying the QRcodes of other users.
    DataBaseHelper
    The DataBaseHelper class aims to contain all the actions do to the database, including adding, deleting, searching And
    GeoLocationFetcher
    A class that fetches the user's current location using the Google Play Services API.
    HighestScoreOfAllPlayerActivity
    The HighestScoreOfAllPlayerActivity class displays the highest score of all players in the game.
    HomeActivity
    The HomeActivity class extends the AppCompatActivity class and is responsible for displaying the entry to show user's qrcodes and the entry for searching up other user's profile and qrcodes
    MainActivity
    The MainActivity class extends the AppCompatActivity class and is responsible for displaying signing in page.
    MapActivity
    The MapActivity class extends the AppCompatActivity class and is responsible for displaying the map which can show nearby QRCodes according to their geolocation.
    MyQRCodeActivity
    The MyQRCodeActivity class extends the AppCompatActivity class and is responsible for displaying the qrcodes I have added to my account.
    MyRankingActivity
    The MyRankingActivity class extends AppCompatActivity and is responsible for displaying the ranking page which shows the ranking by scores in descending order.
    Player
    The Player class represents a player with a name, email, and phone number.
    PlayerArrayAdapter
    This class extends the ArrayAdapter class and represents an adapter for the player list view.
    PlayerCodeActivity
    This class represents the activity to display the QR codes of a specific player.
    PlayerCodeArrayAdapter
    This class extends the ArrayAdapter class and represents an adapter for the QR code list view of a player.
    ProfileActivity
    The ProfileActivity displays the user's profile information, which is retrieved from shared preferences and displayed in the UI elements.
    QRCode
    QRCode class represents a QR code containing content, hash code, score, QR code name, visual representation, and comments.
    QRCodeArrayAdapter
    This class extends the ArrayAdapter class and represents an adapter for the list view of QR codes.
    QRCodeDetailActivity  
    QRCodeStats
    The QRCodeStats class contains methods for generating statistics and visual representation of a QR code based on its SHA-256 hash value.
    QRDetailActivity
    Represents an activity that displays details of a QR code.
    SearchActivity
    This class represents the SearchActivity that allows the user to search for other player profiles by name or QR code.
    SearchByCodeMapActivity
    SearchByCodeMapActivity is an activity that displays a map with markers representing QR codes with their geolocations.
    SearchFragmentByCode
    A dialog fragment for searching players by code.
    SearchFragmentByName
    A dialog fragment for searching players by code.
    ShowOtherProfile
    The ShowOtherProfile class displays the profile information of another user that was clicked on from a search result list.
    ShowQRCodeActivity
    This class represents an activity that displays information about a scanned QR code.
    SignUpActivity
    The SignUpActivity class is responsible for allowing the user to sign up for the application
    StatisticsActivity
    Activity for displaying statistics
    UploadPhotoActivity
    Activity for uploading photos
    ViewOnMapActivity
    ViewOnMapActivity is an activity that displays a map with markers representing QR codes with their geolocations.
